name: ARCADEHALLA: PROTOTYPE
description:
Generally a bit laggy on some browsers; Microsoft Edge tends to render the best performance (for some reason).
You can always download the windows build available for the best performance.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Space Bar - Dash/Dodge

Left Click - Fire

Right Click - Alt Fire

R - Reload

[1-5] - Weapon Select

Q - Quick Weapon Switch

Survey: https://forms.gle/K2RQw81VQpqqXDA96
